turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu gürültülü sesi duymasan daha rahat uyurdun.
english_example_sentence: If you were not to hear this loud noise, you would sleep more comfortably.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не слышал этот громкий шум, ты бы спал спокойнее.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bu gürültülü sesi ______ daha rahat uyurdun.
